name: Hack-Hopper
description:
GMTK Game Jam 2020 Submission. 

You play a computer hacker who has had enough of Korp's schemes, and set out to destroy their turrets they use to oppress the people of planet Jossel with your l33t hacking skillz. Hack into turrets with RIGHT-CLICK, and attack turrets with LEFT-CLICK. 

But be careful! These turrets are hella fast, and you have to get down to at most 1 turret left to win! Choose your path through the turrets wisely, as if your turret gets destroyed while you're in it, or you leave too many turrets active, it's G4M3 0V3R.
